title: Basic Overnight Oats Recipe
directions: Throw everything in a jar, screw the lid on top, shake, and off it goes into the fridge. The next morning add a dash of milk, a sweetener (if you want) and enjoy
ingredients: 1/2 cup rolled oats (1/2 cup = about half the jar)
1 cup milk (eg. soy milk, almond milk)
1 tsp cinnamon (or other spices like cardamom or vanilla extract)
some slices of fruit (again, any are possible. Well, maybe not avocado. Or tomato.)
all sorts of fresh or frozen berries
